course_description: This course uses several quantitate tools and excel formulas to teach students to compute important concepts to determine fundamental values of assets and corporate financial decisions. Students are assigned problems sets and cases that present real-world problems faced by corporate managers, and students apply the concepts and they learn in course to solve these problems.
